Guidance On Caring For Your Louis Vuitton Bag

Your Authentic or replica Louis Vuitton bags is an investment. Take time to learn how to clean it and properly care for it so that it lasts for many years.

The Monogram and Damier Collection fromLouis Vuitton handbags are among the most popular styles of all of their bags. One reason may be that these bags are made from a coated canvas and trimmed with leather. The coated canvas (usually the body of the bag) is some-what water resistant,not waterproof! Propre care for coated canvas: It can be easily wiped clean with a damp soapy cloth without harming the bag.

The leather trim requires a bit more care. Louis Vuitton uses some of the most durable and finest leathers, so they will last for years and years with proper care. One leather, as seen on most Monogram bags (usually the handles or straps) is vachetta leather. This leather, when new, is creamy beige. With exposure to air, water, oils from your hands, etc., it will gradually turn darker over time and result in a beautiful honey color. Be careful! If you touch the leather with lotion or makeup on your hands it will leave unattractive smudges. Also carrying it in the rain is a bad idea, as this will make spots on the leather. proper care for vachetta leather: First of all, carry your bag on your arm or shoulder, not in your hands. Hands can be dirty with oils without us even knowing which will harm your bag. Also, every so often wipe your leather with a simple baby wipe. This may ever so slightly darken the leather but it will only darken it gradually and keep the color even all over the bag. You do not want the tops of the handles to be dark and the rest of the bag’s leather to be very light. Never use chemicales or cleaners on the leather as this will damage your leather and make it discolored or very dark! If the leather becomes dry (from not carrying it at all) it can crack! Check your leather and see if it looks and feels dry. If so you can use a leather lotion.

The Damier Collection (the brown checks) is trimmed with a more durable leather. This leather can actually be wiped with a damp cloth and it should not change color over time.

This article is in no way meant to give you fear of damaging your Louis Vuitton bag or Louis Vuitton bags 2010 which could result in you choosing not to carry it. Hopefully the article can make you more aware of how to care for your LV bags or any replica designer louis vuitton handbags, so that it can last longer.

How to identify authentic Louis vuitton bags

Louis Vuitton has a long history in the fashion industry. How many designer handbags,Louis Vuitton bags are stylish, fashionable and high quality. In determining its own business of designer handbags wholesale, Louis Vuitton is to forget all brands. However, authentic Louis Vuitton goods sold be difficult. To be considered a reputable dealer of Louis Vuitton handbags to be known, here are some things must be respected.

First Serial Number: Each bag Louis Vuitton has a unique serial number printed on the bag. If you have a dealership with the same numbers on their bags, you know they arereplica Louis Vuitton.

2nd Handles: Authentic bags are genuine leather strap, not vinyl, most of the time. The operation is fully leather or vinyl, without superimposition of the bands on the two straps or can be treated. Although the bags are not replica.

3rd stitching: the stitching on the straps and handles, leather match almost exactly. The bag is fully sewn onto, straight and clean. They could not pay a high price and the promise of a different quality.

4th Buckles: square with his cheap Louis Vuitton bags 2010 , buckles. The loops used to say, Louis Vuitton on the sides. Other geometric forms such as circles and rectangles are not used – square only.

5th Lining: Lining Louis Vuitton bag is sewn well and can be either leather or satin. Even if the food is stuck, you definitely have a knock-out pink.

6th Sense of smell: cheap Louis Vuitton bags and the smell of calfskin, no chemicals. Otherwise, they could be replicas of Louis Vuitton bags.

Like any designer handbag, quality is generally greater indication of whether or not you a bag of faith. The material, seams, and the structure of the bag should not be mistakes. When choosing a wholesaler, looking for a company that offers a 100% money back guarantee. If the supplier believes that they really work with genuine products, they would not hesitate to offer a guarantee for their products.
